item.title: CVE-2024-43207|2024-08-19T13:32:32.492Z -- valiano -- unite%20gallery%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Valiano Unite Gallery Lite.This issue affects Unite Gallery Lite: from n/a through 1.7.62.

item.title: CVE-2023-33310|2024-06-04T17:22:06.619Z -- valiano -- unite%20gallery%20lite
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Valiano Unite Gallery Lite allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Unite Gallery Lite: from n/a through 1.7.59.
